title: To be (olla) - verb
content:
The verb 'olla' (to be) is the most important verb.

**Conjugation (Present Tense):**
- minä olen = I am
- sinä olet = You are
- hän on = He/She is
- me olemme = We are
- te olette = You (plural/formal) are
- he ovat = They are

**Negative:**
- minä en ole = I am not
- sinä et ole = You are not
- hän ei ole = He/She is not
